title: Blackcurrant and peppermint macaroons
description: Delicate macarons flavoured with blackcurrant and mint. Fresh blackcurrants are juiced to give a powerful taste punch.
ingredients: 60g/2¼oz free-range egg whites (2 medium eggs), plus 1 free-range egg, white only, lightly whisked for slackening the mixture
mint leaves, finely chopped to decorate
